Q_DESC: Write a C program to find that in which quadrants the given x and y co-ordinates are present in a graph. If it is in 1st Quadrant display Ist Quadrant, if it is in 2nd Quadrant display IInd Quadrant, if it is in 3rd Quadrant display IIIrd Quadrant, if it is in 4th Quadrant display IVth Quadrant and if it is in center display Origin:
TESTCASE_1:
20 30
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
point (20,30) lies in the First quandrant
TESTCASE_2:
-30 -60
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
point (-30,-60) lies in the Third quandrant
TESTCASE_3:
300 -8
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
point (300,-8) lies in the Fourth quandrant
TESTCASE_4:
-180 180
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
point (-180,180) lies in the Second quandrant
